item.title: Help on a compiler
item.dc:creator: @xxpkpurexx xxpkpurexx
item.description:
@xxpkpurexx wrote:

@echo off @TITLE E Bunny's Compiler if exist "%programfiles(x86)%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles(x86)%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. :end echo Finished! pause exit

Well i just download the jdk 6 update 21
and i guess it wont load this can some1 either give me a new compiler or fix this 1 thanks
